import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var light=colors.light;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{height:pxToRem(3),borderRadius:borderRadius.md,overflow:"visible",position:"relative"},colorPrimary:{backgroundColor:light.main},colorSecondary:{backgroundColor:light.main},bar:{height:pxToRem(6),borderRadius:borderRadius.sm,position:"absolute",transform:"translate(0, ".concat(pxToRem(-1.5),") !important"),transition:"width 0.6s ease !important"}}};
